content:
I am a fifth-year PhD student at Xidian University, within the School of Electronic Engineering. I work with Prof.Bo Chen and Prof.Mingyuan Zhou. Previously, I obtained my bachelor's degree from Xidian University. My main research interests lie in machine learning and deep Bayesian statistics, My recent researches focus on representation learning and
deep generative models, with applications to text analysis, natural language process, etc.

title: DongshengWang
